title: [Sponsor] Raycast — Spotlight on Steroids
content:
Modern teams rely on countless third party tools. Many of these tools have moved to the browser and operating systems haven’t caught up with this trend. The simplest things take way too many clicks and staring at loading indicators has become a norm. Context switching is a pain and hardly any work gets done.

Raycast pairs the search functionality of macOS Spotlight with deep integrations of third party services. Without leaving the application, you can create an issue in Jira, review pull requests in GitHub, or join a Zoom call. Personalize your workflows further with scripts and an upcoming API. This beautiful app brings clarity back to your daily work. Download it for free.

 ★
author: Daring Fireball Department of Commerce
